metadata.title: CVE-2024-26599 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: pwm:Fix out-of-bounds access in of_pwm_single_xlate() With args->args_count ==2 args->args[2] is not defined. Actually the flags are contained inargs->args[1].

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
